TopicTitle: Using MechJeb 2 to fly my shuttle...

Articles.Content:
I decided to enter a Shuttle Challenge in the Challenge section. But I am a horrible pilot and I noticed that even players who are great pilots have issues with space shuttles. So I knew putting my shuttle in the piggyback position would not work. But also the Shuttle I designed for MechJeb2 to fly (well, a jet plane) could not be placed on top of a rocket stage. So I made a sandwiched shuttle as I called it. After much testing and solving problems by coming at the from different directions, I got this:

It also shows just how well MechJeb 2 can work if you make sure to understand its limitations and don't mind it going a tad crazy every once and a while.
